document_data.name: Polar Ray
document_data.mainbody: '''''Polar ray''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, a ray of freezing cold air and ice was released from the caster's hands towards a target. The caster could attack an opponent up to {{SI|25|ft}} distant. The range and damage caused by the spell was determined by the caster's skill level.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[divine focus]], either a small cone made from ceramic that was painted white or a prism.
